description: A suppressor popular with the U.S. special forces.  Requires the SOCOM muzzle brake for mounting onto.  <muzzle/suppressor>

variants.description: A suppressor with a sleek design, popular with the U.S. special forces.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SOCOM muzzle brake, as well as a variety of flash hiders from SureFire.  <variant:black>

A suppressor with a sleek design, popular with the U.S. special forces.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SOCOM muzzle brake, as well as a variety of flash hiders from SureFire.  <variant:fde>

notes: the higher-diameter collar is reflected in the negative trim value

//integral_longest_side: absorbs the length of the SureFire SOCOM muzzle brake it mounts onto (66 mm)

//notes: even though this suppressor is likely too short for a standard 7-in. cover, for now, we presume that
description: A military suppressor sometimes issued to army troops.  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the army flash hider.  <muzzle/suppressor>  Due to its old design, this model has some effect on accuracy.

variants.description: An older design of a suppressor, known for being part of the SOPMOD kit of modifications issued to U.S. special forces.  Due to some play in the mounted positioning of this suppressor, it's known to affect accuracy slightly.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the M4QD flash hider.  <variant:black>

An older design of a suppressor, known for being part of the SOPMOD kit of modifications issued to U.S. special forces.  Due to some play in the mounted positioning of this suppressor, it's known to affect accuracy slightly.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the M4QD flash hider.  <variant:fde>

notes: the higher-diameter collar is reflected in the negative trim value

//integral_longest_side: absorbs the length of the KAC M4QD flash hider it mounts onto (48 mm)
//loudness_modifier: the review puts this suppressor's performance slightly below SOCOM556-RC2 (at least with muzzle score)
SOCOM556-RC2's own score in this mod is -23
the overall sentiment for QDSS' performance is that despite its faulty design, it performs equal to or even better than some current market options
//handling_modifier: we give a positive modifier because we believe that this supressor would further improve the handling bonus from the flash hider it mounts onto, rather than take away from its performance due to gas dispersion
//dispersion_modifier: due to the slight play in the position of the suppressor after mounting, the accuracy of the gun may vary slightly

//notes: even though this suppressor is likely too short for a standard 7-in. cover, for now, we presume that
description: A large and potent suppressor.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SR muzzle brake, also from Thunder Beast Arms.  <muzzle/suppressor>

variants.description: A heavy-duty suppressor rated for full-auto.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SR muzzle brake.  <variant:black>
A heavy-duty suppressor rated for full-auto.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SR muzzle brake.  <variant:fde>
A heavy-duty suppressor rated for full-auto.  <muzzle/rating:556>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:none>  Instead, it mounts onto the SR muzzle brake.  <variant:olive>

notes: the higher-diameter collar is reflected in the negative trim value

//integral_longest_side: Dominus-SR completely covers the muzzle brake it mounts onto, absorbing its length (57 mm)
//acceptable_ammo: due to a wide range of calibers, we leave this able to be installed on any caliber for the time being

variants.description: A compact pistol suppressor, shorter than most models on the market.  <muzzle/rating:9mm>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:thread>  <variant:black>
A compact pistol suppressor, shorter than most models on the market.  <muzzle/rating:9mm>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:thread>  <variant:fde>
A compact pistol suppressor, shorter than most models on the market.  <muzzle/rating:9mm>  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:thread>  <variant:olive>

notes: the lower-diameter collar is reflected in the trim value

//notes: technically mounts on a choke adapter, but given that the source has no separate information about, we'll pretend it's a direct-thread mount much like a rifle
assumes the longest variant at 12.5 in.
theoretically modular, in that it allows adjusting the length of the suppressor, but not in the field
description: A bulky, boxy suppressor.  This model is also reported to reduce felt recoil significantly.  <muzzle/suppressor/mount:choke>  <muzzle/suppressor>
